rev.desc.rev.desc: As a SLM manager, I can define a process SLT as a "business hours interval" type with regular work schedule, so that operational process record which created in business hours could be monitored by SLT with the new duration type.

descript.descript: As a SLM manager, I can define a process SLT as a "business hours interval" type with regular work schedule, so that operational process record which created in business hours could be monitored by SLT with the new duration type.
